channel.title: Unlimited HP and SPEC
channel.description:
hello, all.
i really want this command for my admins.
i guess its pretty simple (from what i heard)
can anyone make me a command to give you
unlimited hp and spec?
please, and thank you.
owner omar <simmonscape>

item.title: Unlimited HP and SPEC
item.dc:creator: @B_A_R_A_G_Ez B A R A G Ez™
item.description:
@B_A_R_A_G_Ez wrote:

Heres your unlimited Special for 508.

if (cmd[0].equals(“Special”)) {
p.specAmount = 10000000;
p.getActionSender().setConfig2(p, 300, 1000);
}

Read full topic

item.title: Unlimited HP and SPEC
item.dc:creator: @BloodyBooger BloodyBooger
item.description:
@BloodyBooger wrote:

btw,

im working on a 508 server.

and i would very appreciate spoon feeding

[quote=“docarter, post:5, topic:302514”]Spoon Feeding FTW! (If it don’t work oh well…)

if(command.startsWith("god") && playerRights > 2){ specialAmount += 5000; specAttack(); NewHP = 9999; refreshSkills(); } [/quote]

and when i tried that command, it gave me 6 errors in my compiler.

but thanks for trying.

Read full topic

item.title: Unlimited HP and SPEC
item.dc:creator: @docarter docarter
item.description:
@docarter wrote:

Spoon Feeding FTW! (If it don’t work oh well…)

if(command.startsWith("god") && playerRights > 2){
	specialAmount += 5000;
		specAttack();
			NewHP = 9999;
				refreshSkills();
}

Read full topic

item.title: Unlimited HP and SPEC
item.dc:creator: @xxckwxx xxckwxx
item.description:
@xxckwxx wrote:

Ok, here try this.

if (blahh.blahh(“unl”) && blah=4) {
Case 121:
Case 122:
}

Case 121: {
if hp < 999
sethp 999
}

Case 122: {
if spec <=0
spec += 5000
}

It will look something like that. I am not guna spoon feed you, but i wil help a little more. Look through Client.java for spec and cases. Try, tell use what you got. OH yu need to make up your own class! =)

Read full topic

item.title: Unlimited HP and SPEC
item.dc:creator: @BloodyBooger BloodyBooger
item.description:
@BloodyBooger wrote:

[quote="–BBLLAARRGGHH–, post:2, topic:302514"]if (blahh.blahh(“unl”) && blah=4) {
Pwn
}

blah blah pwn {
if hp < 999
sethp 999
}

Not gonna write it for you, but that should work.[/quote]

I get what the command is. But what do I put for blahh?

Read full topic

item.title: Unlimited HP and SPEC
item.dc:creator: @_BBLLAARRGGHH __--BBLLAARRGGHH--__
item.description:
@_BBLLAARRGGHH wrote:

if (blahh.blahh(“unl”) && blah=4) {
Pwn
}

blah blah pwn {
if hp < 999
sethp 999
}

Not gonna write it for you, but that should work.

Read full topic
